question: Article 88 of the Constitution of India is responsible for which among the following provision?
option1: Rights of Ministers as Respects the Houses
option3: Conduct of Business of the Government of India
answer: Rights of Ministers as Respects the Houses
explanation: Article 88â€”Rights of Ministers as Respects the Houses states that every minister shall have the right to speak and take part in the proceedings of either House, any joint sitting of the Houses and any Committee of Parliament of which he may be named a member. But he shall not be entitled to vote.
